ChunkText: please note that international students are not eligible for this program. students can receive loans in their home country to apply towards their expenses in the us.
ContextBefore: you can try searching for scholarships on the internet, through your countrys embassy in the us, or through any educational advising centers that might be near you, such as educationusa. financial aid student loans the financial aid and student loans available through umbc are only available through the US national financial aid program, fafsa.
ContextAfter: please note that it is very difficult to get a loan in the US unless you have a family member or sponsor already in the US as a citizen or permanent resident that can help you.
